1564106401_1EsM7XQ7MNtL2M8e823PoNiZMy2SB.body: Don't let them get you down OP. White people are exposed to actual systemic racism all the time, since it is the media actually writes hate articles against them, and the governments in most western countries make laws to discriminate against them (diversity quotas, etc.). You're right to think something is unjust, insanity has taken hold.
